I have just completed the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Gatsby Bootcamp","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8t0vNu2fCCM"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" generously offered by ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Andrew Mead","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://mead.io/"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":", the result of which is the site you see here.   Content is added in the easy-to-use Contentful editor, processed though my code written with Gatsby & React, and published with GitHub Pages.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I still have quite a bit of work to do to transform this website from a bootcamp project into my personal profile / portfolio.   The below is a bit of a note to self, but it may be interesting to reflect back on some day and see how far I've come, so I'm publishing it with today's Blog Post.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"#TODO:","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Make the site CSS my own and style it the way I want.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Link the pages other than the Blog Post to Contentful so that I can easily edit them without going into the codebase.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Make a Portfolio section of this site to display the projects I have completed to date.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Edit my contact info, Home Page, etc. to be more fleshed out than the current dummy site.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
